name: Screen Annotations
description:
Keep everyone on the same page

A flexible component set to annotate your mock-ups and communicate status to your team.


Saving this component set to your team's library will easily give access to a simple and unified way of keeping track of annotations regardless of project type.


  • A flexible set of breakpoints that can be adjusted on a project or team basis
  • A flexible set of frame statuses that can be adjusted on a project or team basis
  • Light and dark annotation cards
